synopsis.text: Golden Lion Shiki's epic confrontation with the legendary Pirate King, Gold Roger, unfolds in this special One Piece OVA, taking place two decades before the main storyline. Witness the intense clash between these formidable pirate captains in the infamous 'Great Battle of Edd War', leading to Shiki's retreat. As the world prepares for Gold Roger's execution three years later, Shiki's defiance of the Navy's capture ignites his determination to claim the Pirate King's life for himself, setting the stage for a series of thrilling events in this must-watch prequel.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
